name: Suzaku
description: SUZAKU ($SUZA) is a BEP-20 token that will introduce stakeable NFTs, and a metaverse. The core team consists of 4 crypto enthusiasts from the US and Europe, who have been avid manga fans since their childhood days. Sharing an identical vision, to create an epic fusion of crypto and manga in the metaverse. This is a far from easy to achieve goal so for transparency sake we aim to update our investors on the daily. Keep an eye out for NFT and Staking announcements.
